channel.title: How can I become happy?
channel.description:
Can anybody give me any good ideas on how to fell more happy, and see life as less worthless? Most tips I found on Google was just shit.
SilentCJ: No, I doesn't troll. I'm a social zero on a place where it should be pretty easy to be social. And I can't really stand the people I call friends.

item.title: How can I become happy?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:74, topic:441137”]I like how when people are depressed and decides to post on moparscape to be happy again
Asking for advice, and people list a whole bunch of depressants
dR1nk b33r
V0DK444
Sm0k3 d4t B1UNT
W33D A11 D4Y

terrible advises…
Get a fucking hobby, enjoy what you love doing. If you are looking for a loved one, don’t rush it. It will come one day.
Make money off what you love doing.[/quote]

The only reason to do that is if you’re chilling with friends or bored. That’s the only real reason to do that. However alcohol fights depression pretty well. And not everyone can make money off what they love doing. I enjoy the arts (music and visual) but I know it’s a dead end for most people.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I become happy?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

TheCyberMan:

Are you looking forward to going to a good college? To getting a good job? To meeting a perfect woman and having a family? Maybe you have a particular skill/hobby that you want to master? You can look forward to your future using long term goals, which is what I do. This keeps me motivated and gives me a purpose every day. However, you always want to have a backup plan in case things go awry You can also acknowledge the fact that most teens go through the depressed state of feeling worthless, which may make your emotions easier to handle.

Your living in false hopes.

Read full topic

Kidnap a princess, or get your dad to do it.
[/quote]
I would rather try to abolish the monarchy through more democratic means.[/quote]You missed the joke.

item.title: How can I become happy?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:62, topic:441137”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=543814.msg3991160#msg3991160 date=1336601534]
You don’t have $2.45 for a Steel Reserve 40oz? Your life does suck.
[/quote]
I found some price list for 3 years ago, the cheapest alcohol I can get cost $4.6 per litre, since I doesn’t have an income I can’t really afford to drink much. Failing school would cost me several thousand dollars. Failing next year would cost me $6000-16000 (Dependant of how I measure it), so becoming a alcoholic isn’t an alternative.

SilentCJ: I have money, just not money to waste. I don’t see alcohol as something I need right now.[/quote]

Not saying become an alcoholic. I’m saying go out, buy a forty, chug it, go screw around somewhere. When you sober up, you’ll be straight. I promise.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I become happy?
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:68, topic:441137”][quote author=_s link=topic=543814.msg3991813#msg3991813 date=1336688435]

Then get a job…

You say it like its easy.

I’ve been stuck in my shitty job for almost a year now and i hate it, i have tried to get a new job but there is nothing out there.

It all picks up in the summer, I finally got a job a month ago and it’s been great, just as a customer assistant. But now I’ve been offered a job at a software company as an ASP.net and SQL developer. Just don’t give up would be my advice, I’d been looking for so long.

ASP.NET u poor sod
[/quote]
How come? :P[/quote]it’s a pain in the ass

Read full topic

item.title: How can I become happy?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Near enough nothing, for a while now I’ve felt empty in general about life but you just learn to put up with it I guess.

I’ve noticed I feel less like this when I’m occupied and usually thats when I have a girlfriend as I always spend time around them and usually I’m happy but its not simply finding a girl and going out with her as I said this because all my girlfriends(which aren’t mistakes xD) I’ve always really cared about…
Music short term/while your doing something short term helps with it.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I become happy?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:59, topic:441137”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=543814.msg3990989#msg3990989 date=1336591681]
Kidnap a princess, or get your dad to do it.
[/quote]
I would rather try to abolish the monarchy through more democratic means.

Travel the world, meet a girl, and most importantly, become a philosopher.

If it was so easy I would do it years ago.

Drinking is out of question, I see it as stupid and I doesn’t have the money for it.[/quote]

You don’t have $2.45 for a Steel Reserve 40oz? Your life does suck.

Read full topic

fapping always works… for 10 minutes.

Then you become eternally depressed.
[/quote]until you fap again.

I fap cus im depressed. I’m depressed cus Im fat. its a vicious cycle
[/quote]fap more to lose weight

Messed up the joke. It’s from Austin Powers.[/quote]Haven’t seen any those movies for years, don’t really remember much except mini me

item.description:

working out is what got me out of being really depressed a while back. it makes you feel good about yourself, and you can release some steam doing it. it gives you goals to reach for too, lifting a certain amount or somethingblablabla
